raw_body: WICKRAMASINGHE – S.Y.R.S. (Ramya) (nee Senevirathne) – (Retired Science-trained teacher),​ beloved wife of late S.Y.I.C. Wickramasinghe (Irvine),​ loving mother of Yvonne and Dr. Channa,​ mother-in-law of Dulindra and Dr. Aloka,​ precious grandmother of Damian,​ devoted daughter of late David Senevirathne and late Leela Sandaseeli Senarathne,​ sister of Jayanthi,​ Yamuna,​ Palitha,​ Ravi and Nirmika and daughter-in-law of late S.Y. Pudias Wickramasinghe and late Nancy Wickramasinghe. Remains lie at “Restpect Home” (Jayarathne) from 8:00 a.m. on 3rd May 2024. Cortege leaves on 4th May 2024 at 4:00 p.m. for cremation at 4:30 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Borella. (Pansukula at 3:00 p.m.).         028882
